Package edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Comment
    A comment meant for a classmate.
    CommentActivity
    An Activity that solicits a Comment about the specified Person.
    CommentContentProvider  
    CommentsDataSource
    Persistent data storage for Comment using a database defined in MySQLiteOpenHelper.
    MainActivity
    An Activity that displays a list of the names of people in CS 180A.
    MySQLiteOpenHelper
    Creates and upgrades a database for storing Comments.
    Person
    Information about a person (student or teacher) in CS 180A: Mobile Application Development.
